section.title: Description
section.paragraph: This element is the root element of the MTS theme. All additional theme elements are children of this element.
This element is required and may appear only once.

attributes.attribute: The version of MTS supported by the theme.
The id of the default scheme. If not specified, the engine will assume the default scheme is the first listed.
The languages supported by the theme (in ISO 639-1 format), separated by commas. If not specified, the engine will assume the only language supported is English.

section.title: Data
section.paragraph: This element contains no textual data.

section.title: Engine Requirements
section.paragraph: This element does not require any special processing.
